description: This file defines the package manifest management class 'PkgManifest' for handling multi-lib package lists, constructing initial and full package manifests, and parsing install outputs within the openembedded build system.

classes.name: PkgManifest
classes.description: A subclass of 'Manifest' that manages parsing and creating package list manifests, especially handling multilib variants.

methods.name: _split_multilib(self, pkg_list)
methods.description: Splits a space-separated list of packages into a dictionary keyed by package type, identifying multilib variants.

methods.name: create_initial(self)
methods.description: Creates the initial package manifest file, splitting packages by multilib variants when necessary.

methods.name: create_final(self)
methods.description: Placeholder method for creating a final package manifest, currently unimplemented.

methods.name: create_full(self, pm)
methods.description: Generates a complete manifest based on initial manifest parsing and installing packages, parsing output of the install process.
